column2: Boingo Wireless, Inc. engages in the distribution of wireless connectivity solutions. The company is headquartered in Los Angeles, California and currently employs 463 full-time employees. The firm operates as a service provider of wireless connectivity solutions across its managed and operated network and aggregated network for mobile devices such as laptops, smartphones, tablets and other wireless-enabled consumer devices. The company acquires long-term wireless rights at venues, such as airports, transportation hubs, stadiums, arenas, universities, convention centers, and office campuses; builds wireless networks, such as DAS, Wi-Fi and small cells at those venues, and monetizes the wireless networks through a range of products and services. As of December 31, 2016, the Company operated 36 DAS networks containing approximately 19,200 DAS nodes. Its Wi-Fi network includes locations that the Company manages and operates, as well as networks managed and operated by third-parties with whom it contracts for access.
